name: DNSDB
description: This app supports investigative DNS lookup actions on DNSDB

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity
Get data of current data limit

actions.verbose: If the limit parameter is not specified, the action will use 200.

time_first_after.description: Record first seen after (epoch, relative seconds e.g. -31536000, or UTC timestamp e.g. 2021-01-05T12:06:02Z)

time_first_before.description: Record first seen before (epoch, relative seconds e.g. -31536000, or UTC timestamp e.g. 2021-01-05T12:06:02Z)
